
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18867416" title="发布于 2025-05-09 08:00">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">在 .NET 中使用 Sqids 快速的为数字 ID 披上神秘短串，轻松隐藏敏感数字！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>在当今数字化时代，数据的安全性和隐私性至关重要。随着网络应用的不断发展，数字 ID 作为数据标识和访问控制的关键元素，其保护显得尤为重要。然而，传统的数字 ID 往往直接暴露了一些敏感信息，如顺序编号或数据库主键ID，这不仅增加了数据泄露的风险，还可能让不法分子有机可乘。</span></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>本文大姚将带领大家在 .NET 中使用 Sqids 快速的为数字 ID 披上神秘短串，从而轻松隐藏敏感数字，保护数据安全。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Sqids 介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Sqids 是一个基于 C# 编写、开源的轻量级工具库，它允许你从数字生成类似 YouTube 的 ID。它可以将数字（如 127）编码为字符串（如 yc3），然后你可以将这些字符串解码回原始数字。当你想要将数字（如顺序数值 ID）混淆为看似随机的字符串，以便在 URL 和其他地方使用时，Sqids 就非常派得上用场。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>功能特点</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>Sqids 生成的 ID 是唯一的，并且始终可以解码回原始数字。</span></li>
<li><span>可以将多个数字捆绑成一个 ID，然后可以将该 ID 解码回相同的数字集。</span></li>
<li><span>Sqids 生成的 ID 确保不包含常见的脏话，因此您可以在用户可以看到的地方安全地使用这些 ID（例如在 URL 中）。</span></li>
<li><span>.NET 7 及以上版本支持所有整数类型（如 int、long、byte、short 等），而旧版本仅支持 int。</span></li>
<li><span>采用基于 span 的优化实现，最小化内存分配并最大化性能。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>创建一个控制台应用</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>首先我们创建一个名为：<code><span>SqidsExercise</span></code><span>&nbsp;的 .NET 9 控制台应用：</span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250509013120350-1129843829.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250509013125182-455283452.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>安装 Sqids NuGet 包</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>在 NuGet 包管理器中搜索&nbsp;<code><span>Sqids</span></code><span>&nbsp;安装：</span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250509013138517-2006752339.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>简单使用示例</span></h2>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31RRRRBNsA9OdPQhNEpjJvwCvqAqibqpYzfl7TCaStzavdpMib6b2UZm7NUqic3Yx54oASZeHLX9fJS3/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; internal class Program<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; static void Main(string[] args)<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; // 使用默认选项创建 SqidsEncoder 实例<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var sqids = new SqidsEncoder&lt;int&gt;();<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; // 编码单个数字<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var id = sqids.Encode(99);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine($"编码单个数字: {id}"<span>); // 输出：Q8P<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; // 解码单个 ID<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var number = sqids.Decode(id).Single();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine($"解码单个 ID '{id}': {number}"<span>); // 输出：99<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; // 编码多个数字<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var ids = sqids.Encode(7, 8, 9);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine($"编码多个数字 7, 8, 9: {ids}"<span>); // 输出：ylrR3H<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; // 解码多个 ID<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var numbers = sqids.Decode(ids);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine($"解码多个 ID '{ids}': {string.Join("<span>,&nbsp;", numbers)}"<span>); // 输出：7, 8, 9<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; // 使用自定义选项创建 SqidsEncoder 实例<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var customSqids = new SqidsEncoder&lt;int&gt;(new SqidsOptions<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Alphabet =&nbsp;"mTHivO7hx3RAbr1f586SwjNnK2lgpcUVuG09BCtekZdJ4DYFPaWoMLQEsXIqyz"<span>,//自定义字母表（注意：字母表至少需要 3 个字符）<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; MinLength = 5,//最小长度，默认情况下，Sqids 使用尽可能少的字符来编码给定的数字。但是，如果你想让你的所有 ID 至少达到一定的长度（例如，为了美观），你可以通过 MinLength 选项进行配置：<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; BlockList = {&nbsp;"whatever"<span>,&nbsp;"else"<span>,&nbsp;"you"<span>,&nbsp;"want"<span>&nbsp;} //自定义黑名单，Sqids 自带一个大的默认黑名单，这将确保常见的诅咒词等永远不会出现在您的 ID 中。您可以像这样向这个默认黑名单添加额外项：<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; });<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; // 使用自定义 SqidsEncoder 编码和解码<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var customId = customSqids.Encode(8899);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine($"使用自定义 SqidsEncoder 编码: {customId}"<span>); // 输出：i1uYg<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var customNumber = customSqids.Decode(customId).Single();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine($"使用自定义 SqidsEncoder 解码: {customNumber}"<span>); // 输出：8899<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; }<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源码地址</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>更多项目实用功能和特性欢迎前往项目开源地址查看👀，别忘了给项目一个Star支持💖。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>源码开源地址：<a href="https://github.com/sqids/sqids-dotnet" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/sqids/sqids-dotnet</a></li>
<li>本文示例源码：<a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetExercises/tree/master/SqidsExercise" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetExercises/tree/master/SqidsExercise</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>优秀项目和框架精选</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>该项目已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。坑已挖，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没🤞）。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">

</ul>
